verses.verse: "May he <S%H5401>kiss<s%> me with the <S%H5390>kisses<s%> of his <S%H6310>mouth!<s%> For your <S%H1730>love<s%> is <S%H2896>better<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%>

"Your <S%H8081>oils<s%> have a <S%H2896>pleasing<s%> <S%H7381>fragrance,<s%> Your <S%H8034>name<s%> is [like] <S%H9553>purified<s%> <S%H8081>oil;<s%> <S%H5921>Therefore<s%> <S%H3651><s%> the <S%H5959>maidens<s%> <S%H157>love<s%> you.

<S%H4900>"Draw<s%> me <S%H310>after<s%> you [and] let us <S%H7323>run<s%> [together!] The <S%H4428>king<s%> has <S%H935>brought<s%> me into his <S%H2315>chambers.<s%>" "We will <S%H1523>rejoice<s%> in you and be <S%H8055>glad;<s%> We will <S%H2142>extol<s%> your <S%H1730>love<s%> <S%H4480>more<s%> <S%H4480>than<s%> <S%H3196>wine.<s%> <S%H4339>Rightly<s%> do they <S%H157>love<s%> you."

"I am <S%H7838>black<s%> but <S%H5000>lovely,<s%> O <S%H1323>daughters<s%> of <S%H3389>Jerusalem,<s%> Like the <S%H168>tents<s%> of <S%H6938>Kedar,<s%> Like the <S%H3407>curtains<s%> of <S%H8010>Solomon.<s%>

"Do not <S%H7200>stare<s%> at me because I am <S%H7840>swarthy,<s%> For the <S%H8121>sun<s%> has <S%H7805>burned<s%> me. My mother's <S%H1121>sons<s%> were <S%H2734>angry<s%> with me; They <S%H7760>made<s%> me <S%H5201>caretaker<s%> of the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> [But] I have not <S%H5201>taken<s%> <S%H5201>care<s%> of my own <S%H3754>vineyard.<s%>

<S%H5046>"Tell<s%> me, O you <S%H7945>whom<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> <S%H157>loves,<s%> <S%H351>Where<s%> do you <S%H7462>pasture<s%> [your flock,] <S%H351>Where<s%> do you make [it] <S%H7257>lie<s%> <S%H7257>down<s%> at <S%H6672>noon<s%>? For <S%H4100>why<s%> should I be like one who <S%H5844>veils<s%> herself <S%H5921>Beside<s%> the <S%H5739>flocks<s%> of your <S%H2270>companions<s%>?"

<S%H518>"If<s%> you yourself do not <S%H3045>know,<s%> Most <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> among <S%H802>women,<s%> <S%H3318>Go<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> on the <S%H6119>trail<s%> of the <S%H6629>flock,<s%> And <S%H7462>pasture<s%> your <S%H1429>young<s%> <S%H1429>goats<s%> By the <S%H4908>tents<s%> of the <S%H7462>shepherds.<s%>
"To me, my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> you are <S%H1819>like<s%> My <S%H5484>mare<s%> among the <S%H7393>chariots<s%> of <S%H6547>Pharaoh.<s%>
"We will <S%H6213>make<s%> for you <S%H8447>ornaments<s%> of <S%H2091>gold<s%> With <S%H5351>beads<s%> of <S%H3701>silver.<s%>"
<S%H5704>"While<s%> the <S%H4428>king<s%> was at his <S%H4524>table,<s%> My <S%H5373>perfume<s%> <S%H5414>gave<s%> forth its <S%H7381>fragrance.<s%>
"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is to me a <S%H6872>pouch<s%> of <S%H4753>myrrh<s%> Which <S%H3885>lies<s%> all <S%H3885>night<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> my <S%H7699>breasts.<s%>
"My <S%H1730>beloved<s%> is to me a <S%H811>cluster<s%> of <S%H9218>henna<s%> blossoms In the <S%H3754>vineyards<s%> of <S%H5872>Engedi.<s%>"
<S%H2009>"How<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> you are, my <S%H7474>darling,<s%> <S%H2009>How<s%> <S%H3303>beautiful<s%> you are! Your <S%H5869>eyes<s%> are [like] <S%H3123>doves.<s%>"
